advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Ensure water availability during these stages.
Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane to protect from water scarcity. Apply sprinkler irrigation to reduce heat stress.
The high temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field.
High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liters water in the root zone.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.

Whitefly Infestation - To prevent whitefly infestation in okra seeds, treat with Imidacloprid @ 7g/kg of seeds before sowing.
After harvesting of onion, cut the tops leaving 2.0-2.5cm above bulb. Dry the harvested bulb in a well-ventilated room.
Mango hopper - To control mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 5ml/15 liters of water or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 3ml/15 liters of water.
